Class LoyaltyCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • LoyaltyCard

  • public abstract class LoyaltyCard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a loyalty card for a fictional university bookshop. Amended for inheritency and abstract
    Version:
    (4/3/19)
    Author:
    (Grant Allenby)

      Constructor for objects of class Customer where they purchase a book(s) at the same time as they obtain their card.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoyaltyCard

        public LoyaltyCard(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String firstName,
                   java.lang.String lastName,
                   java.lang.String cardNumber)
        Constructor for objects of class LoyaltyCard where they obtain a card without purchasing any book(s) at that point. The number of points / spend should be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        title - The customer's title.
        firstName - The customer's first name.
        lastName - The customer's last name.
        cardNumber - The number for this card.

      • LoyaltyCard

        public LoyaltyCard(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String firstName,
                   java.lang.String lastName,
                   java.lang.String cardNumber,
                   int points)
        Constructor for objects of class Customer where they purchase a book(s) at the same time as they obtain their card.
        Parameters:
        title - The customer's title.
        firstName - The customer's first name .
        lastName - The customer's last name.
        cardNumber - The number for this card.
        points - The number of points earned - could be zero.

        Parameters:

        numberOfPoints - Amount of points to add to the existing points.

      • reducePoints

        public void reducePoints(int numberOfPoints)
        Record spending the points and subtract from the current points. If points are less than 0 as a consequence of the spend, they will not be reduced and and error will display.
        Parameters:
        points - Amount of points the customer has
        numberOfPoints - Amount of points to subtract from the existing points.
